name: estimate-compression-level
description: A Chrome browser extension that estimates the HTTP compression level of the page.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/images/; cp src/manifest.json dist/; cp ../shared/background.js dist/; cp ../shared/pako.esm.mjs dist/; cp ../shared/images/128.png dist/images/
scripts.zip: cd dist; zip estimatecompressionlevel.zip background.js pako.esm.mjs images/*.png manifest.json

author: leon@fastly.com
